name: Maya Thompson
interest: UX Designer focused on user research and writing clear design requirements

jobs.description: Designing B2B SaaS products for 200+ enterprise clients

projects.title: Dashboard Redesign
projects.description: User story: As a data analyst, I want to customize my dashboard layout so that I can see the most relevant metrics at a glance. Acceptance: Users can drag-and-drop widgets, save custom layouts, and share layouts with team members

insights.description: Increased user satisfaction score from 6.5 to 8.9 through user research
Conducted 50+ user interviews informing product decisions
Improved key user flow completion rate by 45%
Functional requirement: Interface must support keyboard navigation for accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA)
User story format: As a mobile user, I want to access key features offline so that I can work without internet. Acceptance: App caches last 100 items, syncs when online, shows sync status
